simplesect.para: MUST be called during system init

briefdescription.para: Get an iic device by iic device id. For how to use iic device hal refer to Functions in iic device structure.

detaileddescription.para:
iic_id
ID of iic, defined by user
!NULL
Pointer to an iic device structure
NULL
Failed to find the iic device by iic_id
Need to implemented by user in user code get one designware device structure
